1.content: One day you happened upon a house you thought to be the wanted's, so you decided to try to get inside since it looked like nobody's around. You found a cracked open window, and gathered some things to climb inside what appeared to be a bedroom. As you entered the house, you felt dizzy and passed out. Unbeknownst to you, they had a security program that caused big problems for those that tried to illegally enter their house. When you came to, it was all of a sudden very dark. You assumed that you passed out, and nobody noticed, since you couldn't see anything in the darkness. All of a sudden a light was switched on, and you saw the enormity of the situation you were in. You were on a fabric surface that stretched on for a long distance, and estimated yourself at 2 in tall. Based on the other structures on said surface, you surmised you were one of their beds. But as this was going through your head, you noticed someone coming into the room. Whose room was it?
1.title: the beggining

14.content: You look at the person entering the door and see the adonis that is Siva Kaneswaren. You were mesmerized by this hunk, and didn't realize what was happening around you. You watched take off his clothes as he was getting ready for bed. When he finally stripped the last of his clothes off, you remembered where you were, and tried to run away from danger. The problem was you kept slipping on the satin sheets that he had on his bed. You watched in horror as Siva walked over to the bed, and started to sit down right on top of you. There was nothing you could do but watch as his ____________ landed on top of you.
14.title: unavoidable doom

144.content:
Siva's penis head falls on you.

Does he notice?
144.title: his penis head

choices: No, you know first hand that it totally kills the mood
15.content:
It was Nathan's room.

You could see Nathan on his computer, whacking off to something...

Do you interrupt?
15.title: nathan

info.brief_description: You shrink unawares with the band the Wanted.  PLEASE ADD!!!!!
info.description: You shrink while sneaking into the wanted's house. What will happen to you? The character can't die, and if spotted they will think he is a bug. PLEASE ADD!!!!!!!!!! Thanks a lot.
